A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form an alliance against the mother and son since they don’t really like or believe that the kids cat is an evil one and when there are lots of dead bodies, they begin to think it is probably just epileptic convulsions.
